description: This week’s Hammer of Math takes a close look at the choices behind the Savage Echoes and Red Rampage Stratagems in the Liberator Assault Group in the new Codex: Blood Angels. title: Hammer of Math: Blood Angel Liberator Assault Group Stratagems

description: If you’re a dedicated Goonhammer Historicals reader (thank you!) then you’ve seen some of my previous posts on the US-Mexico War. title: Goonhammer Historicals – Force Focus: US-Mexico War
